Make a map in 5 minutes with the Mapzen Android SDK!

  • mobile

  • tangram

You can use our Android SDK to get up and running faster – get a map in an app in five minutes!

Make a map in five minutes with the Mapzen Android SDK from Mapzen on Vimeo.

You can also read along with the tutorial at https://mapzen.com/documentation/android/getting-started/

Don’t forget our iOS SDK five minute video! Any other videos you might like to see? Drop us a line at hello@mapzen.com!
